title: HDFC Bank mulling loan portfolio sale amid growth scrutiny
description: HDFC Bank is considering selling part of its loan portfolio amid regulatory scrutiny on India's surging credit growth. This move, aimed at lowering its elevated credit-deposit ratio post its merger with HDFC Ltd., is the bank's first since combining the two entities. The bank's loan growth has outpaced deposits significantly, raising liquidity concerns.
